item.title: List of U.S. Amusement Parks and Theme Parks
item.description: From amusement parks in Wyoming to theme parks in Central Florida, we’ve compiled an extensive list of all theme parks, water parks, and amusement parks in the United States. This guide will help you find the closest amusement park near you and will help you plan your next adventurous vacation!
